Intermittent Fasting

Time Meal
08:00 am Green Tea, with no sweetener.
10:00 am Coffee, with MCT oil creamer.
12:00 pm Break-fast: 3 eggs, tomato, onion, 1 pita bread
02:30 pm * Best time for workout of the day!*
04:00 pm Pasta Alfredo
07:00 pm Yogurt with fruit and nuts
Disclaimer: This is just a sample diet. Disclaimer: Workout hours and meals should be modified for each person individually. This is just a sample day of each diet.
